name: Mind Trainer 2 Free - games for development of your mind.
name_original: Mind Trainer 2 Free - games for development of your mind.
description:
Not against to improve your memory? Want to use your phone or tablet for your own development, and not just for video games? Then this app is perfect for you.

We have collected in a single application the most interesting and effective games for memory development:
- "Remember the number" - a game for the development of the ability to remember long numbers
- "Watch for them" - and remember the correct sequence of actions to restore
- "Memory Matrix" - will help to develop the ability to remember a static images
- "Color memory" - find all pairs of table cells of the same color

Play with pleasure and boost your memory!
